description: There are really nice spring markets around Prague, so I decided to try my luck at the biggest one of them. Weather could be better, at least I didn´t have to go through crowds. Soon, I met two boys. We had sausage and fooled around with animals that were at the market. Unfortunately, one of the boys had to leave, which ruined my plans about a threesome. Well, the one who stayed was nicer anyways. He was a student saving for a car. I could hardly wish for a better combination. The boy wasn´t exactly shy, he even showed me his cock right in the street with people going by. He didn´t want to suck me off in the public, though. So we had to find a more discreet place to do so. Then the boy invited me to his apartment. He really wanted that car.
title: Czech Hunter 299
